caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. THEODORE R. STOVALL,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Nassau County Court, PAUL KELLY, J.Page 1095
opinion.attorneys:
Nicholas L. Castellano and John C. Schettino for appellant.
William Cahn, District Attorney (Henry P. De Vine of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment, insofar as it convicts defendant of murder in the first degree and sentences him to death, affirmed; otherwise, appeal dismissed upon the ground that there has been no review by the appropriate Appellate Division. No opinion.
Concur: Chief Judge DESMOND and Judges DYE, FULD, VAN VOORHIS, BURKE, FOSTER and SCILEPPI.Page 1096
